name: Card Fighters
description:
Did you ever wonder, what would happend, if you gonna take fighting games, strategic card game and mix the up? I did!

Welp, Card Warios is strategic card fighting game! Each turn, you have one card with two attacks. You have to chose, wich attack to choose, and witch to not. Curently the game have AI batle mode only, but i am trying to put the're a pvp mode!

Have Fun!

ps: I just started with card-games, so i need a lot of feedback, to make the game more fun. Thank Everyone, who posted some.
